thread.title: Free Family Festival: Riverfest MacarthurTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Free Family Festival: Riverfest MacarthurTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Free Family Festival: Riverfest Macarthur Published on : Friday, August 7, 2015
Thousands will celebrate environmental sustainability and the multicultural nature of the Macarthur region at the annual Riverfest event on Saturday, August 29, 2015, from 11am to 3pm.
Held at Koshigaya Park in Campbelltown, Riverfest aims to focus on the natural environment, promote sustainable practices and raise cultural awareness. Families will sample food from around the world, watch traditional dances from all corners of the globe and get tips on sustainable gardening. Featuring interactive workshops, numerous stalls and live entertainment, the event aims to have something for everyone.
Originally hosted by the National Parks Association for more than 10 years, Riverfest has since grown into a vibrant showcase and is now coordinated by Campbelltown City Council in association with the National Parks Association and Macarthur Diversity Services Initiative.
Families will have the opportunity to win prizes by grabbing a copy of the Riverfest Passport and completing activities at participating stalls.Riverfest is a drug and alcohol free event and Koshigaya Park is fully-accessible for wheelchair users.
Source:-Tourism Macarthur
